item.title: Installing and Setting up MQTT
item.description: sudo apt install -y mosquitto mosquitto-clients #sudo cp /usr/share/doc/mosquitto/examples/mosquitto.conf /etc/mosquitto/conf.d/ echo "max_inflight_messages 1" > ~/mosquitto.

item.title: Installing and Using VNC
item.description: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y xfce4 xfce4-goodies tightvncserver vncserver vncpasswd vnc password ***** vncserver -kill :1 mv ~/.

item.title: Looping Video into Zoom
item.description: sudo apt-get install v4l2loopback-dkms v4l-utils ls /dev/video* sudo modprobe v4l2loopback video_nr=9 card_label=“Virtual cam” ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -re -i 2020-10-01-110554.

item.title: Setup Samba from Bash
item.description: Make your folder mkdir ~/happy chmod 0700 ~/happy Set up samba sudo apt install samba sudo nano /etc/samba/smb.

item.title: Shrink a PDF from the command line
item.description: gs -sDEVICE=pdfwrite -dCompatibilityLevel=1.4 -dPDFSETTINGS=/ebook \ -dNOPAUSE -dQUIET -dBATCH -sOutputFile=output.pdf input.pdf

item.title: Simple Netplan Config
